item.title: Density chart D3 example
item.description: function makeDensity() { //empty data set let data = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0] const strokeColor = '#d0d4fc' const fillColor = '#285674' // max data item value const max = 10 // min data item value const min = 0 // setting values for margins of svg content const margin = {top: 20, left: 50, right: 30, bottom: 40} // selecting root element for plot const svg = d3.
